annonsrubrik: Mechanical Engineer to Swedish X-ray Pioneer
annonstext:
Are you a skilled Mechanical Engineer interested in working from conceptual design through production implementation, look no further!

We are looking for an experienced Mechanical Engineer with good hands-on aptitude who is interested in joining a growing organization. You will get the opportunity to have a broad range of responsibilities which include design, development and construction of our X-ray Sources based on Excillum’s complex technology. Apart from designing new products, providing support for existing product lines is equally important.

At Excillum, the culture of engineering is strong. Open debate is encouraged to drive better technical decisions. Exploration of new technologies and continuous process improvement comes natural to Excillum engineers. We are a team of humble, smart people who not only enjoy what we do, but get things done. As a Mechanical Engineer, you will work cross-functionally with Mechanical, Electrical and System Engineers and collaborate with Compliance Engineers, Researchers, Production and Sales.

You will work with

- Construction, cutting and milling of advanced materials
- Developing and testing prototypes of new mechanical designs
- Providing support and improvements to present product lines
- Preparing drawings
- Completing assemblies and products from your own construction ideas

Requirements to apply

- B.Sc. in Mechanical Engineering
- Minimum five years of experience as a Mechanical Engineer
- Proficiency in 3D CAD programs
- Hands-on experience working, refining, and troubleshooting of advanced technical systems
- Fluent in English, both spoken and written

Nice to have

- Experience in thermal simulations
- Experience in high vacuum
- Experience in 3D CAD program Creo suite
- Experience with structure analyse/static analyse
